name: Pikachu
desc: Pikachu is a famous Electric-type Pokémon known for its cuteness and evolution into Raichu.

name: Raichu
desc: Raichu is an Electric-type Pokémon that evolves from Pikachu. It has a more mature appearance and enhanced electric powers.

name: Clefairy
desc: Clefairy is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its fairy-like appearance and its evolution into Clefable.

name: Clefable
desc: Clefable is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its magical and fairy-like characteristics. It evolves from Clefairy.

name: Zubat
desc: Zubat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon known for its cave-dwelling habits and evolution into Golbat.

name: Golbat
desc: Golbat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon known for its large wingspan and ability to evolve from Zubat.

name: Psyduck
desc: Psyduck is a Water-type Pokémon known for its psychic headaches and its evolution into Golduck.

name: Golduck
desc: Golduck is a Water-type Pokémon known for its graceful swimming and powerful aquatic abilities. It evolves from Psyduck.

name: Abra
desc: Abra is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its teleportation abilities and its evolution into Kadabra.

name: Kadabra
desc: Kadabra is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its psychic powers and its evolution from Abra.

name: Alakazam
desc: Alakazam is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its extraordinary intelligence and its evolution from Kadabra.

name: Machop
desc: Machop is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its muscular build and its evolution into Machoke.

name: Machoke
desc: Machoke is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its formidable strength and its evolution from Machop.

name: Machamp
desc: Machamp is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its four powerful arms and its evolution from Machoke.

name: Tentacool
desc: Tentacool is a Water/Poison-type Pokémon known for its tentacles and its evolution into Tentacruel.

name: Tentacruel
desc: Tentacruel is a Water/Poison-type Pokémon known for its highly venomous tentacles. It evolves from Tentacool.

name: Geodude
desc: Geodude is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its rocky appearance and its evolution into Graveler.

name: Graveler
desc: Graveler is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its boulder-like body and its evolution from Geodude.

name: Golem
desc: Golem is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its incredible physical strength and its evolution from Graveler.

name: Ponyta
desc: Ponyta is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its fiery mane and its evolution into Rapidash.

name: Rapidash
desc: Rapidash is a Fire-type Pokémon known for its incredible speed and grace. It evolves from Ponyta.

name: Gastly
desc: Gastly is a Ghost/Poison-type Pokémon known for its gaseous form and its evolution into Haunter.

name: Haunter
desc: Haunter is a Ghost/Poison-type Pokémon known for its mischievous nature and its evolution from Gastly.

name: Gengar
desc: Gengar is a Ghost/Poison-type Pokémon known for its sinister appearance and its evolution from Haunter.

name: Onix
desc: Onix is a Rock/Ground-type Pokémon known for its massive size and its evolution into Steelix through trading.

name: Chansey
desc: Chansey is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its incredible ability to heal and nurture others.

name: Goldeen
desc: Goldeen is a Water-type Pokémon known for its elegant appearance and its evolution into Seaking.

name: Seaking
desc: Seaking is a Water-type Pokémon known for its impressive horn and powerful swimming abilities. It evolves from Goldeen.

name: Mr. Mime
desc: Mr. Mime is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its playful and mime-like nature. It is recognized for its unique appearance.

name: Magikarp
desc: Magikarp is a Water-type Pokémon infamous for its weakness but can evolve into the mighty Gyarados.

name: Gyarados
desc: Gyarados is a fearsome Water/Flying-type Pokémon that evolves from Magikarp. It is known for its destructive power.

name: Snorlax
desc: Snorlax is a massive Normal-type Pokémon known for its incredible bulk and love of sleep.

name: Hoothoot
desc: Hoothoot is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its observant eyes and its evolution into Noctowl.

name: Noctowl
desc: Noctowl is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its nocturnal habits and keen senses. It evolves from Hoothoot.

name: Crobat
desc: Crobat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokémon known for its speed and maneuverability. It evolves from Golbat.

name: Pichu
desc: Pichu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its tiny size and its evolution into Pikachu.

name: Cleffa
desc: Cleffa is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its cuteness and its evolution into Clefairy.

name: Marill
desc: Marill is a Water-type Pokémon known for its round, blue body and its evolution into Azumarill.

name: Azumarill
desc: Azumarill is a Water-type Pokémon known for its water fairy abilities. It evolves from Marill.

name: Sudowoodo
desc: Sudowoodo is a Rock-type Pokémon known for its resemblance to a tree and its signature move Mimic.

name: Aipom
desc: Aipom is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its prehensile tail and its evolution into Ambipom.

name: Wooper
desc: Wooper is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon known for its dual typing and carefree nature. It evolves into Quagsire.

name: Quagsire
desc: Quagsire is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon known for its relaxed demeanor and excellent swimming abilities. It evolves from Wooper.

name: Murkrow
desc: Murkrow is a Dark/Flying-type Pokémon known for its association with omens and its evolution into Honchkrow.

name: Misdreavus
desc: Misdreavus is a Ghost-type Pokémon known for its mischievous and playful nature. It is the pre-evolution of Mismagius.

name: Unown
desc: Unown is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its mysterious and enigmatic nature. It comes in various forms representing different letters and symbols.

name: Girafarig
desc: Girafarig is a dual-type Normal/Psychic Pokémon known for its unique design with a second face on its tail.

name: Steelix
desc: Steelix is a Steel/Ground-type Pokémon known for its incredible durability and resistance. It evolves from Onix.

name: Heracross
desc: Heracross is a dual-type Bug/Fighting Pokémon known for its strength and horn as well as its Mega Evolution.

name: Sneasel
desc: Sneasel is a dual-type Dark/Ice Pokémon known for its agility and sharp claws. It evolves into Weavile.

name: Remoraid
desc: Remoraid is a Water-type Pokémon known for its appearance resembling a fish. It evolves into Octillery.

name: Octillery
desc: Octillery is a Water-type Pokémon known for its long, flexible tentacles and its ability to shoot ink.

name: Mantine
desc: Mantine is a dual-type Water/Flying Pokémon known for its graceful swimming and large, wing-like fins.

name: Blissey
desc: Blissey is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its incredible Special Defense and its role as a caring healer in battles.

name: Wurmple
desc: Wurmple is a Bug-type Pokémon that is known for its early evolutionary stage and simple appearance.

name: Silcoon
desc: Silcoon is a Bug-type Pokémon that undergoes metamorphosis on its way to becoming a Beautifly.

name: Beautifly
desc: Beautifly is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its graceful and colorful appearance.

name: Cascoon
desc: Cascoon is a Bug-type Pokémon that undergoes metamorphosis on its way to becoming a Dustox.

name: Dustox
desc: Dustox is a Bug/Poison-type Pokémon known for its toxic dust and unique appearance.

name: Wingull
desc: Wingull is a Water/Flying-type Pokémon that's often seen near bodies of water.

name: Pelipper
desc: Pelipper is a Water/Flying-type Pokémon known for its role in carrying small Pokémon or items in its beak.

name: Azurill
desc: Azurill is a Normal-type Pokémon with a round, blue appearance and a distinctive zigzag tail.

name: Meditite
desc: Meditite is a Fighting/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its meditation and focus in battles.

name: Medicham
desc: Medicham is a Fighting/Psychic-type Pokémon that excels in martial arts and psychic abilities.

name: Roselia
desc: Roselia is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon known for its beautiful and toxic rose-like appearance.

name: Barboach
desc: Barboach is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon that's often found in mud and wetlands.

name: Whiscash
desc: Whiscash is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon known for its large, catfish-like appearance and affinity for muddy waters.

name: Feebas
desc: Feebas is a Water-type Pokémon known for its plain appearance and potential to evolve into the elegant Milotic.

name: Milotic
desc: Milotic is a Water-type Pokémon that's celebrated for its stunning and graceful appearance.

name: Chimecho
desc: Chimecho is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its wind chime-like appearance and soothing chime sounds.

name: Turtwig
desc: Turtwig is a Grass-type Pokémon with a small, turtle-like appearance, known for its affinity with the earth.

name: Grotle
desc: Grotle is a Grass-type Pokémon that resembles a small, land-based turtle.

name: Torterra
desc: Torterra is a Grass/Ground-type Pokémon known for its large and imposing appearance, resembling a turtle.

name: Chimchar
desc: Chimchar is a Fire-type Pokémon with a mischievous and agile nature.

name: Monferno
desc: Monferno is a Fire/Fighting-type Pokémon known for its martial arts skills and playful demeanor.

name: Infernape
desc: Infernape is a Fire/Fighting-type Pokémon, combining fire and fighting abilities into a powerful package.

name: Piplup
desc: Piplup is a Water-type Pokémon with a penguin-like appearance, known for its aquatic lifestyle.

name: Prinplup
desc: Prinplup is a Water-type Pokémon known for its regal appearance and growing leadership.

name: Empoleon
desc: Empoleon is a Water/Steel-type Pokémon known for its royal and commanding presence, resembling an emperor.

name: Starly
desc: Starly is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its small size and early avian form.

name: Staravia
desc: Staravia is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon with a more developed avian appearance and abilities.

name: Staraptor
desc: Staraptor is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its powerful aerial and hunting abilities.

name: Bidoof
desc: Bidoof is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its simple and cheerful nature.

name: Bibarel
desc: Bibarel is a Normal/Water-type Pokémon known for its beaver-like appearance and aquatic abilities.

name: Kricketot
desc: Kricketot is a Bug-type Pokémon that produces chirping sounds by rubbing its wings together.

name: Kricketune
desc: Kricketune is a Bug-type Pokémon known for its musical abilities and violin-like appearance.

name: Shinx
desc: Shinx is an Electric-type Pokémon with a playful and energetic demeanor.

name: Luxio
desc: Luxio is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its sharp claws and intermediate stage of evolution.

name: Luxray
desc: Luxray is an Electric-type Pokémon with keen senses and a majestic appearance.

name: Budew
desc: Budew is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon known for the small bud on its head that blooms into a flower.

name: Roserade
desc: Roserade is a Grass/Poison-type Pokémon known for its elegant and rose-inspired appearance.

name: Cranidos
desc: Cranidos is a Rock-type Pokémon known for its tough head and powerful charging attacks.

name: Rampardos
desc: Rampardos is a Rock-type Pokémon with an impressive crest and powerful headbutt attacks.

name: Shieldon
desc: Shieldon is a Rock/Steel-type Pokémon known for its shield-like face and defensive capabilities.

name: Bastiodon
desc: Bastiodon is a Rock/Steel-type Pokémon known for its massive shield face and sturdy defenses.

name: Burmy
desc: Burmy is a Bug-type Pokémon known for its ability to take on different forms based on its surroundings.

desc: Wormadam is a Bug/Grass-type Pokémon known for its unique forms that are influenced by its surroundings.

name: Mothim
desc: Mothim is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its moth-like appearance and agility in the air.

name: Combee
desc: Combee is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon known for its beehive-like appearance and collective behavior.

name: Vespiquen
desc: Vespiquen is a Bug/Flying-type Pokémon that resembles a queen bee, known for its leadership in bee colonies.

name: Pachirisu
desc: Pachirisu is an Electric-type Pokémon known for its cheerful and energetic nature.

name: Buizel
desc: Buizel is a Water-type Pokémon known for its playful and otter-like appearance.

desc: Floatzel is a Water-type Pokémon with a sleek and streamlined design, known for its swiftness in the water.

name: Cherubi
desc: Cherubi is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its cherry-like appearance and the small bud on its head.

forms.name: Cherrim

forms.name: Shellos

forms.name: Gastrodon
forms.desc: Gastrodon is a Water/Ground-type Pokémon known for its adaptability to different environments and regional variations.

forms.name: Gastrodon
forms.desc: Gastrodon (East Sea Form) is a special form of Gastrodon found in eastern areas, known for its unique appearance and abilities.

name: Ambipom
desc: Ambipom is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its dexterous hand-like tails and playful antics.

name: Drifloon
desc: Drifloon is a Ghost/Flying-type Pokémon known for its balloon-like appearance and tendency to carry away children.

name: Drifblim
desc: Drifblim is a Ghost/Flying-type Pokémon known for its ability to carry passengers into the sky and its gentle demeanor.

name: Buneary
desc: Buneary is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its fluffy and rabbit-like appearance.

name: Lopunny
desc: Lopunny is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its graceful and elegant appearance, often admired for its beauty.

name: Mismagius
desc: Mismagius is a Ghost-type Pokémon known for its magical and mysterious abilities, often associated with witches and the supernatural.

name: Honchkrow
desc: Honchkrow is a Dark/Flying-type Pokémon known for its intelligent and cunning nature, often seen as a leader among Murkrow.

name: Glameow
desc: Glameow is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its sleek and feline appearance, often admired for its elegance.

name: Purugly
desc: Purugly is a Normal-type Pokémon with a robust and plump appearance, known for its formidable strength and intimidating demeanor.

name: Chingling
desc: Chingling is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its bell-like appearance and the soothing sounds it creates.

name: Stunky
desc: Stunky is a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon known for its skunk-like appearance and the foul odor it emits as a defense mechanism.

name: Skuntank
desc: Skuntank is a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon known for its ferocious nature and the ability to spray a noxious fluid for protection.

name: Bronzor
desc: Bronzor is a Steel/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its metallic appearance and psychic abilities, often used as a protective charm.

name: Bronzong
desc: Bronzong is a Steel/Psychic-type Pokémon known for its gong-like appearance and the ability to communicate with the spirit world.

name: Bonsly

name: Mime Jr.
desc: Mime Jr. is a Psychic-type Pokémon known for its mimicry abilities and its playful nature.

name: Happiny
desc: Happiny is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its nurturing instincts and the egg-shaped pouch it carries.

name: Chatot
desc: Chatot is a Normal/Flying-type Pokémon known for its colorful appearance and its ability to mimic and repeat sounds and speech.

name: Spiritomb
desc: Spiritomb is a Ghost/Dark-type Pokémon known for its enigmatic and sealed nature, often associated with curses and dark mysteries.

name: Gible
desc: Gible is a Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon known for its shark-like appearance and the sharp fin on its head.

name: Gabite
desc: Gabite is a Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon known for its swift and agile nature, often seen burrowing in the ground.

name: Garchomp
desc: Garchomp is a Dragon/Ground-type Pokémon known for its powerful and fearsome appearance, often admired for its speed and strength.

name: Munchlax
desc: Munchlax is a Normal-type Pokémon known for its voracious appetite and its tendency to eat almost anything it encounters.

name: Riolu
desc: Riolu is a Fighting-type Pokémon known for its determination and the ability to sense and control aura energy.

name: Lucario
desc: Lucario is a Fighting/Steel-type Pokémon known for its mastery of aura, combat skills, and its wise and noble nature.

name: Hippopotas
desc: Hippopotas is a Ground-type Pokémon known for its sandy appearance and its ability to create sandstorms.

forms.name: Hippowdon

forms.name: Hippowdon
forms.desc: Hippowdon (Female Form) is a special form of Hippowdon that is recognized for its differences in appearance and behavior.

name: Skorupi
desc: Skorupi is a Poison/Bug-type Pokémon known for its scorpion-like appearance and its powerful stinger.

name: Drapion
desc: Drapion is a Poison/Dark-type Pokémon known for its formidable and predatory nature, often seen as a formidable scorpion-like creature.

name: Croagunk
desc: Croagunk is a Poison/Fighting-type Pokémon known for its toxic skin secretions and its ability to deliver potent poison through its punches.

name: Toxicroak
desc: Toxicroak is a Poison/Fighting-type Pokémon known for its menacing appearance and the deadly toxins it can release from its fingertips.

name: Carnivine
desc: Carnivine is a Grass-type Pokémon known for its carnivorous nature and the vine-like appendages it uses to ensnare prey.

name: Finneon
desc: Finneon is a Water-type Pokémon known for its sleek and streamlined appearance, often found in shoals and schools in the ocean.

name: Lumineon
desc: Lumineon is a Water-type Pokémon known for its vibrant colors and the ability to create beautiful patterns of light in the water.

name: Mantyke
desc: Mantyke is a Water/Flying-type Pokémon known for its graceful gliding in the sky and its caring nature, often seen carrying Remoraid.

name: Snover
desc: Snover is a Grass/Ice-type Pokémon known for its snow-covered appearance and the ability to summon hailstorms in snowy regions.

name: Abomasnow
desc: Abomasnow is a Grass/Ice-type Pokémon known for its intimidating yet majestic snow-covered form, often associated with snowy mountains.

name: Weavile
desc: Weavile is a Dark/Ice-type Pokémon known for its agility and cunning nature, often working in groups to hunt prey and protect its territory.

name: Uxie
desc: Uxie is a Psychic-type Legendary Pokémon known for its role in safeguarding knowledge and memory, often associated with wisdom and tranquility.

name: Mesprit
desc: Mesprit is a Psychic-type Legendary Pokémon known for its emotional influence and the ability to bring joy, sorrow, and emotion to the world.

name: Azelf
desc: Azelf is a Psychic-type Legendary Pokémon known for its willpower and the ability to instill determination and strength in individuals.

name: Dialga
desc: Dialga is a Steel/Dragon-type Legendary Pokémon known for its control over time and the ability to maintain balance in the universe.

name: Palkia
desc: Palkia is a Water/Dragon-type Legendary Pokémon known for its control over space and the ability to shape dimensions in the universe.

name: Heatran
desc: Heatran is a Fire/Steel-type Legendary Pokémon known for its association with volcanic activity and the ability to control the heat of the earth.

name: Regigigas
desc: Regigigas is a Normal-type Legendary Pokémon known for its colossal strength and the power to move continents, often seen as a guardian of the Regi trio.

name: Cresselia
desc: Cresselia is a Psychic-type Legendary Pokémon known for its connection to dreams and the ability to bring peaceful sleep and pleasant dreams to those it encounters.

name: Phione
desc: Phione is a Water-type Legendary Pokémon known for its connection to the sea and its gentle and compassionate nature.

name: Manaphy
desc: Manaphy is a Water-type Legendary Pokémon known for its connection to the oceans and the ability to bond with people and Pokémon.

name: Darkrai
desc: Darkrai is a Dark-type Legendary Pokémon known for its association with nightmares and the power to induce deep, terrifying dreams.

forms.name: Shaymin
forms.desc: Shaymin is a Grass-type Legendary Pokémon known for its association with flowers and the ability to transform into its Sky Form under certain conditions.

forms.name: Shaymin Sky
forms.desc: Shaymin (Sky Form) is a special form of Shaymin known for its graceful and aerial appearance, often associated with the gratitude and the blessings of nature.

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus is a Legendary Pokémon known as the 'Original One' and is said to have shaped the Pokémon universe. Its Normal-type form is considered the default form.

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus (Bug Form) is a unique form with Bug-type characteristics. It showcases Arceus's adaptability, taking on the characteristics of the Bug type.

forms.name: Arceus

forms.name: Arceus

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus (Electric Form) is a special form with Electric-type characteristics. In this form, Arceus embodies the power of electricity and lightning.

forms.name: Arceus

forms.name: Arceus

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus (Fire Form) is a unique form with Fire-type characteristics, representing the fierce and passionate nature of fire.

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus (Flying Form) is a special form with Flying-type characteristics, symbolizing freedom and the power of flight.

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus (Ghost Form) is a unique form with Ghost-type characteristics, often associated with the mysterious and supernatural.

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus (Grass Form) is a special form with Grass-type characteristics, symbolizing nature and plant life.

forms.name: Arceus

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus (Poison Form) is a unique form with Poison-type characteristics, symbolizing toxins and contamination.

forms.name: Arceus
